title: Apple gift card in Crowns to RP
body:
Hello i write because i got an apple gift card wich is worth 150 kr. 
Can i trade it to rp when its not standing in euro but in crowns ?

replies.body: It doesn't look like Apple Gift cards are accepted at all through the normal means. Check out the list of all the available payment options over here-> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590
